column4: Say I log in as 'testuser' and I sudo to 'root'.  Is there any way for a script running as 'root' to find my original user ID?
ofcourse in /var/log/... it's noted that testuser did sudo commands ...
Yes but I mean from a more reliable scripting standpoint.... I want to transfer xauth certificates from the user's account
i'm afraid i can't help with that ...
